name: Keep It In Neutral
description:
Try your hardest to keep the right speed in this racing game all about keeping the right pace. Go too fast and the car ends up rubble, go to slow and the car will cease to be. Try to dodge or utilize oncoming objects in order to control your speed and keep yourself at the right pace.

Controls:

===Player 1 / Single Player===

Movement: A and D

Boost: Z

Slow down: Spacebar

===Player 2===

Movement: Left and Right Arrow Keys

Boost: 7

Slow down: 4

Credits:
